seriesJson.title: Creative mind
seriesJson.description: This series, hosted by Lyman Bryson, presents radio essays about the creative process for the American artist and scientist in the 20th century.

node.title: The creative mind
node.description: This program features Rudolf Arnheim, Margaret Mead, and Milton Nahm speaking on creativity.

node.title: The creative personality
node.description: This program features Jacob Bronowski speaking on aspects of the creative personality.

node.title: The composer as creator
node.description: This program features Walter Piston speaking on music composition and creativity.

node.title: The research scientist
node.description: This program features John C. Sheehan speaking on science and creativity.

node.title: The writer as creator
node.description: This program features Robert Penn Warren  speaking on writing and creativity.

node.title: The painter as creator
